p: First, a standardization curve was built, using the following compounds: Glycerol trioleate, distearin, glycerol oleate (racemic mixture), and methyl oleate. Concentration range for all compounds were from 0.25 to 8.0 mg·mL−1, as follows: 0.25; 0.5; 1.0; and from 1.0 to 8.0, in steps of 1.0 mg·mL−1, using THF (suitable for HPLC, ≥99.9%) as solvent. Afterward, all samples were weighed in the range from 2.0 to 6.0 mg·mL−1, using THF (suitable for HPLC, ≥99.9%) as solvent.
